---
id: send-email-verification-email
title: "Send Email Verification Email"
description: "Send a new verification email to the user's email. After sending an email, a cooldown is triggered during which no new verification email can be sent."
sidebar_label: "Send Email Verification Email"
hide_title: true

---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Send Email Verification Email"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/auth/email/verify/send"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Send a new verification email to the user's email. After sending an email, a cooldown is triggered during which no new verification email can be sent.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"locale","in":"query","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"The number of seconds the user needs to wait before sending a new email.","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"cooldown":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}},"required":["cooldown"],"title":"MailSendResponse"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized.","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"timestamp":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"error":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"},"path":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error","status","timestamp"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}},"429":{"description":"Failed to send another email. Wait until the cooldown is done.","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"timestamp":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"error":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"},"path":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error","status","timestamp"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
